<#cdcd00>1 . Amaldin: <#00cdcd>"How do I buy the L2 of cache_extension? When I try to buy the L2, I'm told I am not able to own more than one of this artifact. I have L1 on this planar wedge. I also tried artifact purchase 36 on wedge, which does not work either."

<#00cdcd><#cdcd00>2 . Aliyah: <#00cdcd>"Newbie You should be able to purchase it on whatever object you have the cache_extension on already, but you may have to purchase it on the object by item number."
<#00cdcd><#cdcd00>3 . Meloku: <#00cdcd>"You would ARTIFACT PURCHASE 36 ON your wedge."
<#00cdcd><#cdcd00>5 . Aliyah: <#00cdcd>"Newbie if the syntaxe Meloku gave doesn't work, try issuing yourself, because it ought to!"
<#00cdcd><#cdcd00>6 . Aliyah: <#00cdcd>"... Oop, didn't need to type newbie there."

<#00cdcd><#cdcd00>7 . Amaldin: <#00cdcd>"I tried ARTIFACT PURCHASE 36 ON 340511 (which is my wedge item number). It gets added to the artifact shopping cart, but then it says "One or more of your artifact purchases is not valid. Please empty your cart and try again." There is also no option to confirm."
<#00cdcd><#cdcd00>8 . Meloku: <#00cdcd>"Have you tried ARTIFACT PURCHASE CLEAR and then adding it again?"
<#00cdcd><#cdcd00>10. Meloku: <#00cdcd>"I would likely put in an issue then."
<#00cdcd><#cdcd00>12. A helpful administrator: <#00cdcd>"You are very welcome!"
<#00cdcd><#cdcd00>13. Merek: <#00cdcd>"Wasn't there a way to mask you're Akkari while not currently in the class>?"
<#00cdcd><#cdcd00>18. Jokul: <#00cdcd>"Is there any benefit to being in a city?"

<#00cdcd><#cdcd00>19. Inthirath: <#00cdcd>"Access to the ylem system, player-initiative rewards systems, inter-city conflicts and pvp, wars, larger pool of people to interact with, storytelling and motivators for your character."
<#00cdcd><#cdcd00>20. Seurimas: <#00cdcd>"There are a lot, both mechanically and socially! Being a rogue is tough, although it's become slightly more accessible over time."
<white>You have set the 'rebounding' defence to the 11 priority.

<white><#ffff00>(COLOR #ffff00SEND HREF="channelinfo newbie"Newbie/SEND/COLOR): Jokul says, "So being a rogue doesnt harm you much, except making the game harder?"
